title: I'm the only one who plays with new player in rank ?
body:
I'm not an awesome player i'll be honest, but im not so bad either, i keep losing all my game because i'm matched with lvl 32 or 50 thats make no sense to me .
    ( i'm lvl 130 btw ) because if  my enemies are lvl 100 or more, i can't carry them even if im feed
They should put a filter on the lvl too ? 
Idk i'm just bored af

replies.body: Level has a low impact on games. Rank affects matchmaking more.

level litterally has 0 to do with skill fam.


It's a terrible scapegoat.
